content.query:
use nyc_taxi_discovery
----no of trips made by duration in hours--
SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
    FROM 
    OPENROWSET(  BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
                 FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
                 DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )AS trip_data
----using TSQL  DATEDIFF function to find the difference between the pickup and drop
SELECT TOP 100
    DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60 as from_hour,
    (DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60)+1 as to_hour,
    COUNT(1) as no_of_trips
    FROM 
    OPENROWSET(  BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
                 FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
                 DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    )AS trip_data
GROUP BY DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60,
    (DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60)+1
ORDER BY DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60,
    (DATEDIFF(MINUTE,lpep_dropoff_datetime,lpep_pickup_datetime)/60)+1;
